newsitem.title: GERMANY: Danzas renames German logistics division.
newsitem.headline: Danzas renames German logistics division.

text.p: International freight forwarder Danzas said it has renamed its German subsidiary Danzas Warehousing & Distribution GmbH as Danzas Logistics GmbH.
The new name reflects the company's changing role as a logistics supplier for specific industries, a statement said.

Danzas Logistics managing director Claus Garbisch said: "The performance of the logistics supplier as the link between manufacturing and the retail industry is increasingly changing from warehousing and distribution to information manager."
The company was thus investing more in computer information systems, he added.

Danzas Logistics GmbH, part of the company's European logistics division, manages the flow of goods and information between producer and sales outlets, particularly in the food, tobacco and body products industries.
"We offer solutions which bring considerable service, costs and time advantages for our clients. Our clients can thus improve their market competitiveness considerably," Garbisch added.
Danzas Logistics clients include Kraft Jacobs Suchard, Johnson & Johnson and Rothmans. --Reuters Air Cargo Newsroom. Tel +44 171 542 7706; Fax: 5017
